`massSight` is a probabilistic method for **cross-study LCâ€“MS feature matching** and **multi-study clustering**.

[![](https://zenodo.org/badge/608216683.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8101763)

## Install

Install from source (recommended until the first release):

```bash
uv pip install git+https://github.com/omicsEye/massSight
```

## Quickstart: match two studies

```bash
mass_sight match study_a.csv study_b.csv \
  --out-candidates candidates.csv \
  --out-top1 top1.csv \
  --ppm 15
```

## Quickstart: cluster multiple studies

Create a multi-study manifest (YAML/JSON) and run:

```bash
mass_sight cluster \
  --manifest path/to/manifest.yaml \
  --out-dir tmp_outputs/mass_sight_cluster_demo \
  --strategy hub \
  --ppm 15
```
